ygData.subject: RE:  Bellow and DDD/CoD
ygData.msgSnippet: I have seen a corpse summoned from the bottom of the Highhold Pass straight up - some 500+ feet to the ledge where they fell off.  I d guess that they are
ygData.messageBody:
I have seen a corpse summoned from the bottom of the Highhold Pass straight
up - some 500+ feet to the ledge where they fell off. I'd guess that they
are using the same "stuff" for ranging corpses as for ranging effects. (But
then how come there are 3 different user interface stlyes to navaigate just
to get into the game? Sometimes exit button is on left, sometimes its on
right, sometimes all the buttons are the same size, sometimes they are
different sizes.)

Also, I have pulled _every_ single bird from the top floor main tree house
with CoD. Hello! 3 Avo's, 2 Har's and a Rook! Also, from the top floor I
have attacked birds that are in the spawn spots on the ground (and they
attack me back - that's how I know!)

So, if its not infinite, its still pretty dog-gone large!

Sylly
